titleInfo.title: ‘Kooria Mooria Bay and Islands, Trigonometrically Surveyed by Commander S.B. Haines, and Lieut. I.P. Sanders, Assisted by Lieu.ts W. Jardine, J. Sheppard & Mess.rs Midshipmen Ball, Stevens & Grieve, of the Indian Navy, 1837. Engraved by J.&C. Walker’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:620 x 945 mm, on sheet 682 x 1008 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Published by John Walker, Geographer to the Honourable East India Company.Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures. Depths shown by soundings.Nautical chart of the southeastern coast of Oman compiled from the surveys carried out by the Bombay Marine’s officers between 1820 and 1829. Includes nine marginal coastal profiles showing ‘Jibbel Subhan’, ‘the Arabian coast from the Anchorage near Ras Sherbedaht’ [Sharbithat], and Kooria Mooria Islands.Contains a note signed by Stafford Bettesworth Haines with remarks on latitude and longitude observations and water level variation.
